text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Opera O-Chan, Doto-Chan, Ayabe-san, Top Road-san's 
team～. Their aura is strong…

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oya, that's… Ryan-san and Bright-san. They've 
got a suspicious atmosphere around them… There 
is where the ninja comes in. Nim-nim.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Because it's a Triathlon, isn't it 
better to have more endurance～?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Hey, isn't Spe-chan okay? It feels 
like she's eating up a lot of fuel!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, today it's about to overflow from the plate～. Fufu, she is 
still refilling～. She can still load a lot of fuel～.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
As Ryan Onee-sama is saying, you can expect a 
lot of endurance. If it's Special Week-sama, 
she will contribute to the championship.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Then, let's call out to her when the meal 
is over! …Huh? Bright? Eh, what, what?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, plain is also important in unfamiliar competitions. 
I have a suggestion for you Onee-sama～.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Triathlon… Triathlon… here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Spee-chan!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Kyaa!? Ah, Ryan-san! And Bright-san…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Were you looking for a Triathlon book? Then it speeds things up! 
Spe-chan, would you like to join our team?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? P-perhaps are you scouting me!? But why me!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Spe-chan who eats a lot can do, will be able to do Triathlon! 
Besides, you have good muscles that are not supple!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Muscles!? You can tell just from looking?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Ryan Onee-sama can hear the voices of the muscles～.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, it's true that I spoke to you in anticipation of the 
praise. What do you say? Why don't you team up with us?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Erm… I'm more interested in winning food 
vouchers than the Triathlon itself…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
In that case, winning is your goal! That's 
what we want! Our goal is to win!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Really!? Hooray!! I want to appear with you! 
Looking forward to working with you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Spe-chan to Ryan-san's team! Wow, 
it looks strong here too. ✰Mark!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Fufu, is the reconnaissance going well～? Matikane Tannhauser♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wawawa! Baba-Bright-san!? Reconnaissance isn't what I'm doing?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
If you haven't decided on a team, 
would you please join our team～?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eh…? Are you sure you're not calling out the wrong person?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
No～. In anticipation of you who have accumulated research and 
practice gathering information from day to day, we invite you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
I really want to win the championship. As a horse 
girl of the Mejiro. And, for Ryan Onee-sama who 
I have been indebted to since childhood.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text: Please lend me your help. To win, you are necessary.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm, necessary… Mhm!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It's an honor to be here!! If I can help, then gladly!! I'm an 
ordinary girl, but please take care of me!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Bright
text_block_list.text:
I'm very grateful to you too. With these 
members, I'm sure we can win～!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: …Kita-chan, the Triathlon entry is due today, right?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Mm…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: …I wonder if we can find another 2 members.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Dia-chan youー

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Ahh!! Chwaa!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I-I'm sorry! I didn't look…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's alright, please don't worry! Oya? Are you 
both also here for the Triathlon entries?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: …Mm, no, Erm… We are…

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Bakushin O-san came to the entry. Then who are your team members?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yes. In section 1 is Sakura Bakushin O, in section 
2 is Sakura Bakushin O, in section 3 is Sakura Bakushin 
O, the anchor is Sakura Bakushin O!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Ehh!? Then, do you mean it's a 1-person team!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That's right! At first, I invited the class members to join the 
team, but everyone refused to participate.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
They were worried about me because the Triathlon would be 
difficult because it requires stamina butー

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps I put a lot of pressure on them 
by competing with the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Then as the class president! I will take this opportunity to 
challenge the difficulties! So I decided to challenge it as a 
1-person team!! Hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: A-amazing… this unwavering mental power…!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
If you continue to be picked at Tracen Academy, 
you will have this much courage…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Reckless challenges, if it's that you want! Exactly because it's 
a difficult challenge! I will participate, even alone!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Reckless… exactly because it's difficult…!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Dia-chan! Let's participate!! I want 
to go to the tournament after all!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I can finally go to a school event with Dia-chan! 
Even if they laugh at us because we ain't worth 
it! I want to participate with Dia-chan!!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Kita-chan…! Me too!! I want to participate!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Bakushin O-san! Can you join us!? Let 
us learn with the same team!!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
We don't have enough team members! Please we 
are looking forward to your cooperation!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see, you're in trouble! I don't mind!! If that's the case, I'll 
help! Because I'm the class president!

Hey, hey, hey, here it comes! That's good! 
This is the team I was looking for!!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Go-Golshi-san!?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ya, it was worth waiting until the last minute. To think such an 
interesting team will come out at the last minute～!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
A clash of personalities, a clash of unknowns? 
I have a premonition of such a big bang～!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: By the way, I will join the team! Nice to meet you!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Yes! Looking forward to working with you!!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: ーMm-hmm, so those are the last three teams.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Team . T.M. Opera O, Meisho Doto, Admire Vega, Narita Top Road.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Team . Mejiro Ryan, Mejiro Bright, Special 
Week, Matikane Tannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Team . Sakura Bakushin O, Gold Ship, 
Kitasan Black, Satono Diamond.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
There are 8 teams in total. It seems like this commemorative 
event will be filled with a lot of excitement! So good!!
